QuestData.Title: Demonslayer of Tanaan
QuestData.Description: Demons! Hate 'em!$b$bGul'dan is spinning up more summoning portals with each passing hour. There's only one way to stem the tide, $n.$b$b<Parvink smashes her gauntleted fist against her open palm.>$b$bSmash 'em!$b$bThe Temple of Sha'naar is a good place to start, or head up to the Throne of Kil'jaeden if you're looking for a real challenge.
QuestData.CompletionText: <Parvink looks at some hatch marks she scribbled on a scrap of paper.>$b$bI'm up to 17 demons killed today. You?
QuestData.RewardText: Nice! You're quite the slayer, $n. Gimmie a low-five!
